alert.note: Alert for Isle of Wight (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 2:41PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTH CENTRAL GATES... SOUTHWESTERN ISLE OF WIGHT...AND EAST CENTRAL SOUTHAMPTON COUNTIES AND THE CITY OF SUFFOLK THROUGH 330 PM EDT... At 241 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Whaleyville, or 8 miles southeast of Holland, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small trees and blow around unsecured objects. Wind impacting handling of high profile vehicles. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Suffolk around 245 PM EDT. Windsor around 310 PM EDT. Zuni around 325 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Longview, Lummis, Suffolk Airport, Drum Hill, Hazelton, Buckland, Saunders, Cleopus, Indika, and Somerton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
